author: Perseus AI Cloud Acceleration team in Alibaba Cloud

misc.TensorFlow: NVIDIA Release 18.09 (build 687556) from NVIDIA GPU Cloud, please pull the docker container from nvcr.io/nvidia/tensorflow:18.09-py2
misc.Data Set: please use TFRecords file format for inference, to create TFRecords file you can use https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/research/inception/inception/data/build_imagenet_data.py
